title: The Lord Digbies designe to betray Abingdon carryed on for divers vveeks by an intercourse of letters. Which are here published for the satisfaction of all men, by Sergeant Major Generall Brown. Together with the cipher which the Lord Digby sent him for that purpose.
author: Browne, Richard, Sir, 1602?-1669.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Laurence Blaiklock, and are to be sold at the signe of the Sugar-loaf at Temple-Bar,
